techmeme.title: Kraken plans to offer tokenized versions of 50+ stocks and ETFs, including Apple and Tesla stocks, to customers in Europe, Latin America, Africa, and Asia (Alexander Osipovich/Wall Street Journal)
OpenAI partners with G42 and others to build a 1-gigawatt AI data center in Abu Dhabi called Stargate UAE, its first large-scale project outside the US (Eliot Brown/Wall Street Journal)
Inside the making of ASML's High NA: the latest-gen EUV machine costs $400M+, has four modules, is assembled in the Netherlands, and five units have shipped (Katie Tarasov/CNBC)
A security researcher finds an exposed Elastic database with 184M records, including login credentials for Apple, Meta, Google, and others; its owner is unknown (Wired)
Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun unveils the Xring O1, a Xiaomi-made 3nm chip that will power three devices, including the Tablet 7 Ultra, in a bid to compete with Apple (Bloomberg)
